News App is a portal in Vietnamese with the aim of reaching millions of Vietnamese people in the country and especially the Vietnamese Community around the world who wish to stay in touch with news and stories. for diverse content presented in a beautifully designed format. We also stick to the journalistic ethics tree by serving the latest news with absolute authenticity and our comments only act as a protector for all users of our portal. We are not carried away by the truth.

Our messengers quickly react to any event by collecting live data. Personal interviews of people involved in that event or incident reinforce the fact that we always guarantee 100% accuracy of the information given.
